Apart from that, Friday Hotel is highly recommended.

nice room ; friendly staffs , so good breakfast , the conveniences is good ! very clean ; reasonable price ! it takes about 15' to go to the bus station by walk !

Tuan Truong , Vietnam
NYX Prague
8.2 Excellent
Based on 114 reviews

Fantastic location near the center of town and extremely easy walk from the train station. One of the best value hotels I have stayed in around Europe.

Would recommend for any solo traveler.

Show more
Karen Cardwell , United States
Aparthotel City 5
9.4 Exceptional
Based on 227 reviews

Very enjoyable! Kristina is a very engaging hostess who genuinely wants all her guests to have a pleasant & stress free visit.

She gives you 5 star hotel treatment, but you save money because her lodgings are in a charming, 100 + year old building, not some glass and aluminum monstrosity. She did our laundry for us at no charge and she even has a children's play area with toys, books & games. There is a piano if you know how to use it. Public transportation is a 3 minute walk and it is about $1.00 for ticket that is good for a 30 minutes ride one way. The Metro is fast and efficient and THE BEST I've ever ridden (compared to Washington DC, London, Paris, Frankfurt). I will visit Kristina's Aparthotel City 5 again soon!

Show more
Carl SAHLIN , United States
NH Prague City
8.1 Excellent
Based on 41 reviews

Everything was excellent, we were upgraded to the executive suite and it was sheer luxury. Wish we could have stayed there for a week.

The only down side was that their Wifi in our room had a very weak signal.

Show more

Charles Bridge Palace Hotel
8.1 Excellent

Enjoyed the stay there very much, location makes everything convenient. The hotel breakfast has a variety to choose from, food is fresh and yummy! Hotel staff are friendly and helpful!

Lovely hotel, friendly staff and very comfortable. Located in walking distance to old and new square and the bridges.

We are very happy with this hotel because of the best location for tourist who need to stay in the heart of city and hotel facilities also in a good standard compare to the price that we paid.

For the staff , they are very friendly and very helpful on every parts of the hotel. We will do recommend this hotel to our friends. It's over expectation!

The driver who took us to and from the airport was great and very helpful.

firas albayati , United Kingdom
K+K Hotel Fenix
8.5 Excellent
Based on 165 reviews

We arrived late, and had read on web about Prague taxi frauds, and people being thretened by taxi drivers.

I called the K+K Fenix mostly to get a recomendation about taxi company, but the friendly concierge said they would send a car to pick us up. 3 hours later; A driver in suit and tie picked us up in a spacious sedan, and took us the absolutely shortes way to our hotel. The best thing was the price. The hotell was great in every respect.

Show more

Grandior Hotel

we are from Sydney and stayed at the hotel for 2 nights. we got upgraded and staff were fantastic and very helpful.

the hotel is located in walking distance from all the important parts of Prague.

It made me memorable because of its breakfast service, the outdoor area of the restaurant has a very nice river view which made you have a good start every day.

Moreover, its staffs were very nice, they knew we would check-out at the so early morning, then they actively well prepared some simple breakfast for us in the evening before the day we left. You know, it made us so warm. I stayed at its Deluxe Double Room, the size and cleanness of it was nice although the facilities were old-style.

Red & Blue Design Hotel Prague
8.6 Excellent
Based on 152 reviews

this hotel is absolutely fantastic...walking distance to charles bridge and all the other attractions in prague.

i cannot fault this hotel in any way. wifi is perfect, the rooms are large, clean, very well appointed, bathroom huge and beautiful, bed extremely comfortable. the breakfast is to die for too. the only problem for us was the weather, which obviously was not the hotel's fault :-) so staying in a bit more than going out was quite nice...we stayed in this hotel for 5 nights and could have easily stayed 5 weeks!!

We stayed 2 nights with 3 persons, they gave us a small withoiut extra bed, then we go back to receptions and ask again.

The hotel stuff apology as they used a half hours to fix the problem for us. But def. they were so helpful and they also had the prof. skills to communicate with customers. We all are happy to stay pure white. The locations is good to find a subway stations too, quiet and safe. The money we paid is very cheap, worth the money!!! Happy stay!!!

Residence Muzeum Vltavínů
9 Excellent
Based on 47 reviews

The room was spacious with a lovely four poster bed. The location was superb, just round the corner from the festive Christmas market square; very peaceful in the attractive cobbled streets and beautiful in the snow.

We ordered breakfast, which was brought to our room; it was a hearty and excellent breakfast. We also enjoyed the free entrance to the Moldavite museum, where we learnt a lot about the local gems.

Perfect distance to all one may want to see in Prague. Finally, very convenient & smooth check-in and checkout.

Trey Kopecky , United States Radisson Blu Alcron Hotel 9.1 Exceptional Based on 206 reviews Comfortable rooms, good food, pleasant staff igor svagusa , Croatia Friday Hotel 9.1 Exceptional Based on 136 reviews The hotel was great, excellent location, friendly staff, tasty breakfast. The only thing that was missing were bigger towels. Apart from that, Friday Hotel is highly recommended. Show more Ricky Gilad , United Kingdom Royal Road Residence 8.3 Excellent Based on 126 reviews 100% satisfiction DongHyun Jang , South Korea The Grand Mark Prague 8.9 Excellent Based on 29 reviews Hotel Sovereign Prague 8.7 Excellent Based on 150 reviews Love the breakfast menu. Hotel staff and location are good. Adrian Chan , Singapore Alchymist Grand Hotel and Spa 9.3 Exceptional Based on 31 reviews We loved everything about the hotel. Would absolutely stay here again. Gary Green , United States Akcent Hotel 8.3 Excellent Based on 77 reviews Comfortable, breakfast was great Tamara Martinkovic , Slovakia The Emblem Hotel 9.1 Exceptional Based on 41 reviews Could have not asked for more. Hotel centrally located in the Old town with imepcable service, great food and special VIP card for luxurious shopping. Show more Angelie Llanillo , Philippines Three Crowns Hotel Prague 7.7 Very good Based on 53 reviews nice room ; friendly staffs , so good breakfast , the conveniences is good ! very clean ; reasonable price ! it takes about 15' to go to the bus station by walk ! Tuan Truong , Vietnam NYX Prague 8.2 Excellent Based on 114 reviews Fantastic location near the center of town and extremely easy walk from the train station. One of the best value hotels I have stayed in around Europe. Would recommend for any solo traveler. Show more Karen Cardwell , United States Aparthotel City 5 9.4 Exceptional Based on 227 reviews Very enjoyable! Kristina is a very engaging hostess who genuinely wants all her guests to have a pleasant & stress free visit. She gives you 5 star hotel treatment, but you save money because her lodgings are in a charming, 100 + year old building, not some glass and aluminum monstrosity. She did our laundry for us at no charge and she even has a children's play area with toys, books & games. There is a piano if you know how to use it. Public transportation is a 3 minute walk and it is about $1.00 for ticket that is good for a 30 minutes ride one way. The Metro is fast and efficient and THE BEST I've ever ridden (compared to Washington DC, London, Paris, Frankfurt). I will visit Kristina's Aparthotel City 5 again soon! Show more Carl SAHLIN , United States NH Prague City 8.1 Excellent Based on 41 reviews Everything was excellent, we were upgraded to the executive suite and it was sheer luxury. Wish we could have stayed there for a week. The only down side was that their Wifi in our room had a very weak signal. Show more Neil Mammen , United States Charles Bridge Palace Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 93 reviews Enjoyed the stay there very much, location makes everything convenient. The hotel breakfast has a variety to choose from, food is fresh and yummy! Hotel staff are friendly and helpful! Poh Hoon Lim , Malaysia Eurostars Thalia Hotel 8.3 Excellent Based on 95 reviews Lovely hotel, friendly staff and very comfortable. Located in walking distance to old and new square and the bridges. Show more Michael Holloway , South Africa Grand Hotel Bohemia 8.8 Excellent Based on 118 reviews We are very happy with this hotel because of the best location for tourist who need to stay in the heart of city and hotel facilities also in a good standard compare to the price that we paid. For the staff , they are very friendly and very helpful on every parts of the hotel. We will do recommend this hotel to our friends. It's over expectation! MEINA BAI , China Vienna House Andel's Prague 8.6 Excellent Based on 95 reviews It was very clean and modern. I like to stat there. I arrived early in the morning and they gave me a early check in. tram station is near to the hotel. Except pillow is too flat and has no neck support. Wifi is good in room. Clean beds. Hot water bath is good too. Lisa Lim , Singapore Hotel Paris Prague 8.6 Excellent Based on 24 reviews Residence Bologna 7.3 Very good Based on 177 reviews Big rooms. Good service. Okay breakfast. In the morning there was a bit of noise. Excellent value for money off you need many people accommodated in a budget. Show more Helena Willis , United States Hotel Salvator 8.6 Excellent Based on 104 reviews Far exceeded our expectations. Great value, excellent location, friendly staff and top notch restaurant. The driver who took us to and from the airport was great and very helpful. Show more Mickey Ridge , United States Park Inn Hotel Prague 8.5 Excellent Based on 89 reviews we got very early flight, the hotel preparing the breakfast for us during the time when we check out MING CHE LIN , Taiwan Hilton Prague Hotel 8.3 Excellent Based on 124 reviews location is ideal if your a business traveller and 7 min by taxi to heart of old prague firas albayati , United Kingdom K+K Hotel Fenix 8.5 Excellent Based on 165 reviews We arrived late, and had read on web about Prague taxi frauds, and people being thretened by taxi drivers. I called the K+K Fenix mostly to get a recomendation about taxi company, but the friendly concierge said they would send a car to pick us up. 3 hours later; A driver in suit and tie picked us up in a spacious sedan, and took us the absolutely shortes way to our hotel. The best thing was the price. The hotell was great in every respect. This should be a 5tar in every area. We stayed four nights and loved it. Easy walk to all of old Prague. Car in private garage. We could not say enough wonderful things about this place and their staff. Truly amazing. I arrive the apt nearly midnight and I can check in by myself which is very easy. rawikan kaewprasith , Thailand Red & Blue Design Hotel Prague 8.6 Excellent Based on 152 reviews this hotel is absolutely fantastic...walking distance to charles bridge and all the other attractions in prague. i cannot fault this hotel in any way. wifi is perfect, the rooms are large, clean, very well appointed, bathroom huge and beautiful, bed extremely comfortable. the breakfast is to die for too. the only problem for us was the weather, which obviously was not the hotel's fault :-) so staying in a bit more than going out was quite nice...we stayed in this hotel for 5 nights and could have easily stayed 5 weeks!! The hotel stuff apology as they used a half hours to fix the problem for us. But def. they were so helpful and they also had the prof. skills to communicate with customers. We all are happy to stay pure white. The locations is good to find a subway stations too, quiet and safe. The money we paid is very cheap, worth the money!!! Happy stay!!!
